short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (AKA. PYSToL) shoots temptation in the face

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The most epic lightweight browser extension to:
- Remove front page on youtube
- Remove sidebar on youtube videos
- Remove comments section (disabled by default)

PYSToL shoots temptation in the face so you can stay focused easier.

God bless you.

Source code:
https://codeberg.org/zacoons/pystol
